comment1: picMenu1 and picMenu2 (combined) are a 12-count (max) of hyper menu buttons
comment2: picMenu1 and picMenu2: properties labelA and showBtnA are for screens 1 and 3 (and) properties labelB and showBtnB are for screen 2
comment3: set the showBtn(X) property accordingly to show or not show the hyper menu button.
